mapper.insert: INSERT INTO market (mwriter, mtitle, mprice, mdetail, maddress, mstate, msold) VALUES (#{mwriter}, #{mtitle}, #{mprice}, #{mdetail}, #{maddress}, #{mstate}, #{msold})
INSERT INTO market (mwriter, mtitle, mprice, mdetail, maddress, mstate, msold) VALUES (#{mwriter}, #{mtitle}, #{mprice}, #{mdetail}, #{maddress}, #{mstate}, #{msold})
mapper.select: SELECT m.mno mno, m.mwriter mwriter, m.mtitle mtitle, m.mprice mprice, m.mdetail mdetail, m.mstate mstate, m.msold msold, m.mregdate mregdate, m.maddress maddress, mf.fileName fileName, a.userid userid FROM market m LEFT JOIN market_file mf ON m.mno = mf.mno JOIN GH_User a ON m.mwriter = a.userid WHERE m.mno = #{mno}
mapper.update: UPDATE market SET mtitle = #{mtitle}, mprice = #{mprice}, mdetail = #{mdetail}, mstate = #{mstate}, msold = #{msold}, maddress = #{maddress} WHERE mno = #{mno}
mapper.select:
SELECT mno mno, mwriter mwriter, mtitle mtitle, mprice mprice, mdetail mdetail, mstate mstate, msold msold, mregdate mregdate, maddress maddress
FROM market
WHERE mno > 0 ORDER BY mno DESC

SELECT m.mno mno, m.mwriter mwriter, m.mtitle mtitle, m.mprice mprice, m.mdetail mdetail, m.mstate mstate, m.msold msold, m.mregdate mregdate, m.maddress maddress, f.fileName fileName
FROM market m LEFT JOIN market_file f ON m.mno = f.mno ORDER BY mregdate DESC LIMIT 4;
